name: Stitched Portraits/Illustrations- - -
description:
The portrait in the photograph is not for sale, It is just an example of my work. 

If you would like to have a portrait made of yourself, a family member, an idol, a pet, you name it...I can stitch it. 

Price depends on what size/style you choose to have made, whether it have fabric involved or if it's just black and white stitch, or with paints. Prices to be discussed with buyer before the making of a stitched illustration...Ranging from £25+ 

You could buy the artwork as raw material (unframed..) in order for you to then frame yourself, or It can be stretched across a canvas - which is usually best for pieces you would like to hang on the wall! 

In order for your illustration to be produced I would need to be sent a good quality photograph of what you would like stitched in order for me to work from. Again depending on what size you would like it, for example; if you want a big piece made, larger than a4, it's best to have a high res photograph so I can have it blown up, etc. 

For any questions or interested buyers please feel free to contact me via this shop or my email ; geehorsfield@yahoo.com and I will get back to you with a quote (:

name: Adorable Handmade Adjustable Rings
description:
Adjustable plastic custom handmade rings, one size fits all!

- Theres only a few left, so when you place your order, please  mention what ring in the photograph you would like to buy -

£4.00 plus post and packaging just £1.50, 50p extra with another item! 

More items coming soon! grab your cute little ring whilst they are still available! :) <3
